title: Media Company Founded by Will Smith and Jada Pinkett-Smith Nears Deal to Sell Minority Stake to Blackstone-Backed Firm; Westbrook is in advanced talks with venture led by former Disney executives Kevin Mayer and Tom Staggs
text:
In November, the company said it was buying Moonbug Entertainment Ltd., the company behind hit children's shows "CoComelon" and "Blippi," for about $3 billion. In August, it said it was spending $900 million to acquire Hello Sunshine, the media company founded by Reese Witherspoon.

(More to come)

Write to Benjamin Mullin at Benjamin.Mullin@wsj.com and Miriam Gottfried at Miriam.Gottfried@wsj.com

Media Company Founded by Will Smith and Jada Pinkett-Smith Nears Deal to Sell Minority Stake to Blackstone-Backed Firm
